mapper.select:

distinct
from user
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into user (ID, HOTEL_ID, USERNAME, PASSWORD, PHONE, STATUS, CREATED_BY, CREATION_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, USER_TYPE, SEX, REAL_NAME, SUPPLIER_ID, HOTEL_NAME, HOTEL_ADDRESS, HOTEL_PROVINCE, HOTEL_CITY, HOTEL_DISTRICT, AUDIT_STATUS, AUDIT_COMMENT, DEPT) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{hotelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplierId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{hotelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hotelAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hotelProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hotelCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hotelDistrict,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{auditComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dept,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
